ViewObject.Name: JobItemAnalysisVO
ViewObject.SelectList: XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.ACTIVITY_ID, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.BUSINESS_UNIT_ID, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.CREATED_BY, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.CREATION_DATE, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_CODE, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.UNIT_RATE, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.UOM, XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.PROJECT_JOB_HEADER_ID, XxboqActivityDetailsEO.ACTIVITY_ID AS ACTIVITY_ID1, XxboqActivityDetailsEO.ACTIVITY_CODE, XxboqActivityDetailsEO.UOM AS UOM1, XxboqActivityDetailsEO.DESCRIPTION, nvl( (select nvl(total,0) / nvl(XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY,1) from (select sum((xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)+(xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)*(xxbjtr.spares_percentage+xxbjtr.maintenance_percentage+xxbjtr.wastage_percentage)/100) total , xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id Act_Job_id from XXBOQ_JOB_ITEM_RESOURCE_T xxbjtr, xxboq_resource_master_group_t xxbrmg, xxboq_resource_items_t xxbri where xxbjtr.item_id = xxbri.item_id and xxbrmg.resource_type_code='L' and xxbjtr.resource_group_id = xxbrmg.resource_group_id group by xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id)t where Act_Job_id=XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID),0) AS VIEW_ATTR, nvl( (select nvl(total,0) / nvl(XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY,1) from (select sum((xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)+(xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)*(xxbjtr.spares_percentage+xxbjtr.maintenance_percentage+xxbjtr.wastage_percentage)/100) total , xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id Act_Job_id from XXBOQ_JOB_ITEM_RESOURCE_T xxbjtr, xxboq_resource_master_group_t xxbrmg, xxboq_resource_items_t xxbri where xxbjtr.item_id = xxbri.item_id and xxbrmg.resource_type_code='S' and xxbjtr.resource_group_id = xxbrmg.resource_group_id group by xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id)t where Act_Job_id=XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID),0) AS VIEW_ATTR, nvl( (select nvl(total,0) / nvl(XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY,1) from (select sum((xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)+(xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)*(xxbjtr.spares_percentage+xxbjtr.maintenance_percentage+xxbjtr.wastage_percentage)/100) total , xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id Act_Job_id from XXBOQ_JOB_ITEM_RESOURCE_T xxbjtr, xxboq_resource_master_group_t xxbrmg, xxboq_resource_items_t xxbri where xxbjtr.item_id = xxbri.item_id and xxbrmg.resource_type_code='M' and xxbjtr.resource_group_id = xxbrmg.resource_group_id group by xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id)t where Act_Job_id=XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID),0) AS VIEW_ATTR, nvl( (select nvl(total,0) / nvl(XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY,1) from (select sum((xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)+(xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)*(xxbjtr.spares_percentage+xxbjtr.maintenance_percentage+xxbjtr.wastage_percentage)/100) total , xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id Act_Job_id from XXBOQ_JOB_ITEM_RESOURCE_T xxbjtr, xxboq_resource_master_group_t xxbrmg, xxboq_resource_items_t xxbri where xxbjtr.item_id = xxbri.item_id and xxbrmg.resource_type_code='E' and xxbjtr.resource_group_id = xxbrmg.resource_group_id group by xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id)t where Act_Job_id=XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID),0) AS VIEW_ATTR, nvl( (select nvl(total,0) / nvl(XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY,1) from (select sum((xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)+(xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)*(xxbjtr.spares_percentage+xxbjtr.maintenance_percentage+xxbjtr.wastage_percentage)/100) total , xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id Act_Job_id from XXBOQ_JOB_ITEM_RESOURCE_T xxbjtr, xxboq_resource_master_group_t xxbrmg, xxboq_resource_items_t xxbri where xxbjtr.item_id = xxbri.item_id and xxbrmg.resource_type_code='G' and xxbjtr.resource_group_id = xxbrmg.resource_group_id group by xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id)t where Act_Job_id=XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID),0) AS VIEW_ATTR

ViewAttribute.Name: TransManPower
ViewAttribute.Expression: nvl( (select nvl(total,0) / nvl(XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY,1) from (select sum((xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)+(xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)*(xxbjtr.spares_percentage+xxbjtr.maintenance_percentage+xxbjtr.wastage_percentage)/100) total , xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id Act_Job_id from XXBOQ_JOB_ITEM_RESOURCE_T xxbjtr, xxboq_resource_master_group_t xxbrmg, xxboq_resource_items_t xxbri where xxbjtr.item_id = xxbri.item_id and xxbrmg.resource_type_code='L' and xxbjtr.resource_group_id = xxbrmg.resource_group_id group by xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id)t where Act_Job_id=XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID),0)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSubcontractor
ViewAttribute.Expression: nvl( (select nvl(total,0) / nvl(XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY,1) from (select sum((xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)+(xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)*(xxbjtr.spares_percentage+xxbjtr.maintenance_percentage+xxbjtr.wastage_percentage)/100) total , xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id Act_Job_id from XXBOQ_JOB_ITEM_RESOURCE_T xxbjtr, xxboq_resource_master_group_t xxbrmg, xxboq_resource_items_t xxbri where xxbjtr.item_id = xxbri.item_id and xxbrmg.resource_type_code='S' and xxbjtr.resource_group_id = xxbrmg.resource_group_id group by xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id)t where Act_Job_id=XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID),0)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransMaterial
ViewAttribute.Expression: nvl( (select nvl(total,0) / nvl(XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY,1) from (select sum((xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)+(xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)*(xxbjtr.spares_percentage+xxbjtr.maintenance_percentage+xxbjtr.wastage_percentage)/100) total , xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id Act_Job_id from XXBOQ_JOB_ITEM_RESOURCE_T xxbjtr, xxboq_resource_master_group_t xxbrmg, xxboq_resource_items_t xxbri where xxbjtr.item_id = xxbri.item_id and xxbrmg.resource_type_code='M' and xxbjtr.resource_group_id = xxbrmg.resource_group_id group by xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id)t where Act_Job_id=XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID),0)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransEquipment
ViewAttribute.Expression: nvl( (select nvl(total,0) / nvl(XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY,1) from (select sum((xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)+(xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)*(xxbjtr.spares_percentage+xxbjtr.maintenance_percentage+xxbjtr.wastage_percentage)/100) total , xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id Act_Job_id from XXBOQ_JOB_ITEM_RESOURCE_T xxbjtr, xxboq_resource_master_group_t xxbrmg, xxboq_resource_items_t xxbri where xxbjtr.item_id = xxbri.item_id and xxbrmg.resource_type_code='E' and xxbjtr.resource_group_id = xxbrmg.resource_group_id group by xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id)t where Act_Job_id=XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID),0)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransGenaralExpences
ViewAttribute.Expression: nvl( (select nvl(total,0) / nvl(XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.QUANTITY,1) from (select sum((xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)+(xxbjtr.quantity * xxbri.item_rate)*(xxbjtr.spares_percentage+xxbjtr.maintenance_percentage+xxbjtr.wastage_percentage)/100) total , xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id Act_Job_id from XXBOQ_JOB_ITEM_RESOURCE_T xxbjtr, xxboq_resource_master_group_t xxbrmg, xxboq_resource_items_t xxbri where xxbjtr.item_id = xxbri.item_id and xxbrmg.resource_type_code='G' and xxbjtr.resource_group_id = xxbrmg.resource_group_id group by xxbjtr.job_item_analysis_id)t where Act_Job_id=XxboqJobItemAnalysisEO.JOB_ITEM_ANALYSIS_ID),0)
